short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get a notifications for Salah time and dont spend your day without praying at time

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sometimes we can forget about prayer times because we are busy in front of the computer. That's why we've developed a great browser extension that reminds you to pray as far ahead of time as you want, helping you get ready to pray or prepare for congregational prayer.

How to get the extension:
To add this feature to your browser, visit the following link:

Feedback and suggestions:
If you have any ideas to improve the plugin or encounter issues while using it, feel free to contact me privately.

Please share this extension with your friends and family to spread the word. ðŸŒŸ
